name: fastapi-alpine-starter
description: FastAPI + Alpine Contact Form with Tailwind CSS

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p static/js && cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js static/js/alpine-min.js && cp node_modules/@alpinejs/mask/dist/cdn.js static/js/alpine-mask.js && cp node_modules/@alpinejs/focus/dist/cdn.js static/js/alpine-focus.js && cp node_modules/@alpinejs/collapse/dist/cdn.js static/js/alpine-collapse.js && cp node_modules/axios/dist/axios.min.js static/js/
scripts.dev: npm run copy-assets && npm run watch:css
